title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 321.1 - Ester and dust forms of certain phenoxy herbicides
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 321.1 - Ester and dust forms of certain phenoxy herbicides

State Regulations

No person shall use any preparation containing one or more
esters of 2,4-D, 2,4-5T or MCP within the affected area as set forth in section
321.3
or within two miles of the
boundaries of any grape vineyard which is located, in whole or in part, within
the said affected area. No person shall use within the said affected area any
dust formulations of 2,4-D, 2,4-5-T or MCP in any chemical form
whatever. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
321.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
